    \index{reliafree \textit{(package)}!reliafree.validation \textit{(module)}|(}
\section{Module reliafree.validation}

    \label{reliafree:validation}
This is the Class that is used to represent and hold information related to
verification and validation tasks of the Program.


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                                Classes                                %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\subsection{Classes}

\begin{itemize}  \setlength{\parskip}{0ex}
  \item \textbf{Validation}: The Validation class is used to represent the validation tasks in a system 
being analyzed.



  \textit{(Section \ref{reliafree:validation:Validation}, p.~\pageref{reliafree:validation:Validation})}

\end{itemize}
